name: Knight Gambit
description:
## Knight Gambit

Don this hat and be ready to charge into adventure with a playful twist of strategy and style.

### Bumpkins.io

Deposit this wearable in Sunflower Land to equip it on your Bumpkin

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
